item.title: Reflections on Writing a Mythic C2 Agent in Zig
item.description: Over the past couple of months, I’ve been writing a mythic C2 implant in zig. “Why?”, you ask. Well, it’s all part of my learning process. I also wanted to understand how C2 frameworks work and how zig can be used for offensive tooling. There are lots of C2 frameworks out there and each has its own quirks and uniqueness. I happened to settle on Mythic. Mythic supports agents written in any language.
